channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Travel Must Haves with American Touriste
channel.desc: Get set for your next adventure with American Tourister. Explore The Holiday Shop's top picks in luggage, fashion, jewellery and beauty-your travel must-haves, all in one place.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: ndulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style
channel.desc: Every Wednesday at 11am here on QVC Style we'll be offering hints, tips and advice on looking your best, along with another look at fabulous fashion from the Morning Style show with Kathy.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonds on 6 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Spread the cost of precious sparkle and discover a treasure trove of diamonds available in six easy interest-free instalments. Snap up this dazzling deal today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Holiday Shop
channel.desc: Jetting off abroad or enjoying a little stay-cation? Join us to discover the most desirable holiday essentials, featuring fashion, jewellery, beauty and luggage.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Footwear Edit
channel.desc: Refresh your footwear collection with The Footwear Edit, showcasing a stylish range of on-trend trainers, boots and more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Annie Haak Jewellery
channel.desc: Discover Annie Haak Jewellery, a gorgeous range of fine designs comprising necklaces, pendants, earrings, bracelets and more. A great gift at any idea, you'll love what Annie Haak has to offer.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Jewellery
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Malika Jewellery
channel.desc: Tune in to discover Malika Jewellery, a bold new jewellery brand you're bound to love, featuring statement pieces, semi-precious gemstones and more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamond Spectacular
channel.desc: Continuing the extravaganza celebrating the timeless beauty of Diamonds. Join us as we view at least 60 truly dazzling designs, ranging from subtle to breathtaking and classic to contemporary.
